issue.title: [CF 17] Aura tracking creating errors
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Im trying to monitor trinket procs and after i set them up I start getting this error
2. things Like Living Bomb works fine , but Hot Streak or any other buff is erroring
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

What version of the product are you using?
1.3.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Locals:
self = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon8 {
0 = <userdata>
ShowTimer = false
DurationAndCD = false
InvertBars = false
ShowCBar = false
Unit = "player"
OnlyMine = false
cooldownbar = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon8_Cooldown {}
usableAlpha = 1
texture = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon8Texture {}
WpnEnchantType = "mainhand"
learnedTexture = false
presentAlpha = 1

updateTimer = 0.032999999076128

powerbar = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon8_Power {}

BuffShowWhen = "present"

}

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user AndieUk | Imported from CurseForge issue #17 | Raw

comments.body:
The latest version seems to have fixed everything, so thanks so much :-p


> Posted by CurseForge user AndieUk
